node.title: Template: Featured Image (Vertical)
node.excerpt: This post should display a featured image, if the theme supports it. Non-square images can provide some unique styling issues. This post tests a vertical featured image.

node.title: Template: Featured Image (Horizontal)
node.excerpt: This post should display a featured image, if the theme supports it. Non-square images can provide some unique styling issues. This post tests a horizontal featured image.

node.title: Template: More Tag
node.excerpt: This content is before the more tag. Right after this sentence should be a “continue reading” button of some sort.

node.title: Template: Excerpt (Defined)
node.excerpt: This is a user-defined post excerpt. It should be displayed in place of the post content in archive-index pages.

node.title: Template: Excerpt (Generated)
node.excerpt: This is the post content. It should be displayed in place of the auto-generated excerpt in single-page views. Archive-index pages should display an auto-generated excerpt of this content. Depending on Theme-defined filters, the length of the auto-generated excerpt will vary from Theme-to-Theme. node.title: Template: Comments
node.excerpt: This post tests comments in the following ways. Threaded comments up to 10 levels deep Paginated comments (set Settings > Discussion > Break comments into pages to 5 top level comments per page) Comment markup / formatting Comment images Comment videos Author comments Gravatars and […]

node.title: Template: Comments Disabled
node.excerpt: This post has its comments, pingbacks, and trackbacks disabled. There should be no comment reply form, but should display pingbacks and trackbacks.

node.title: Template: Pingbacks And Trackbacks
node.excerpt: This post has many pingpacks and trackbacks. There are a few ways to list them. Above the comments Below the comments Included within the normal flow of comments
